title: ABOUT VISUALIT
text: Visualit transforms the way you experience books by bringing stories to life through stunning, AI-generated visuals. Using advanced machine learning, the app extracts key scenes, character descriptions, and dialogues, turning them into immersive illustrations.  Designed for readers of all ages, the app seamlessly integrates with your reading habits, offering an intuitive and customizable experience. With Visualit, you don’t just read the story—you see it unfold before your eyes.
